Hi Company_D — Seeker_E here. Thanks for the update and for the option to share prompts in advance. Here are 3 proposed bullets for the 15–20 min validation screen (if/when a trigger hits):

1) Reliability/on-call improvement deep dive: what the baseline issues were, what changes I personally drove (process + technical/operational), and how we validated results (SLA 94.8%→99.1%, incidents 18/mo→7/mo).
2) DRI tradeoffs + decision-making: the 2–3 hardest scope/priority calls I made, what I cut/kept, how I handled conflicting stakeholder asks, and how I set go/no-go readiness.
3) Scope alignment: team/env (8 eng + ops, ~12 dependencies), risk management (rollback/monitoring/runbook), and how I operated under ambiguity + fixed timeline.

If a decline comes in or the finalist doesn’t progress, I can make time same-day/next-day on short notice. No need to respond unless there’s a change — I’ll stick to the cadence you set. תודה / thanks again.
